      • generateNarrative

        public static org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.INarrative generateNarrative(org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseResource resource)
        Automatically generates a narrative (human-readable formatted text) for the given resource. Custom templates for specific resources are configurable in extensions/fhir/narratives/narratives.properties.
        Parameters:
        resource - The domain resource to generate the resource for. Bundle, Parameters, and Binary resources are not domain resources and thus do not support narratives.
        Returns:
        The created narrative object. This will also be automatically set on the resource itself.

      • createOperationOutcome

        public static org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.OperationOutcome createOperationOutcome(java.lang.String severity,
                                                                               java.lang.String code,
                                                                               java.lang.String details)
                                                                        throws org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException
        Creates a FHIR OperationOutcome resource with the given details.
        Parameters:
        severity - Indicates whether the issue indicates a variation from successful processing. Values: fatal | error | warning | information
        code - Describes the type of the issue. The system that creates an OperationOutcome SHALL choose the most applicable code from the IssueType value set, and may additional provide its own code for the error in the details element. Values: invalid | security | processing | transient | informational
        details - Additional details about the error.
        Returns:
        The OperationOutcome resource.
        Throws:
        org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException - If the resource type could not be found.

      • createBinaryResource

        public static org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBaseBinary createBinaryResource(byte[] byteArray,
                                                                               java.lang.String mimeType)
                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a FHIR Binary resource with the given byte array and MIME type.
        Parameters:
        byteArray - The byte array to encode in the resource.
        mimeType - The MIME type of the binary data.
        Returns:
        The Binary resource
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If Base64 encoding failed.

                                                                               java.lang.String mimeType)
        Creates a FHIR Binary resource with the given byte array and MIME type.
        Parameters:
        base64String - The Base64 encoded string to include in the resource.
        mimeType - The MIME type of the binary data.
        Returns:
        The Binary resource

        Parameters:
        mimeType - The MIME type to check.
        Returns:
        True if the MIME type is FHIR XML, false otherwise

        Parameters:
        mimeType - The MIME type to check
        Returns:
        True if the MIME type is XML, false otherwise
